title: [build] release build with multiple TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST is broken
body_html:
On Ubuntu 16.04 with 2x GP100, TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="6.0;6.1;7.0" python setup.py install build command succeeds, but the build is in fact broken.

>>> import torch
>>> torch.Tensor(4)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
RuntimeError: invalid argument 4: inconsistent size at ../aten/src/TH/generic/THTensor.cpp:101

These two build commands

  1. TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="6.0;6.1;7.0" DEBUG=1 python setup.py build develop
  2. python setup.py install

don't have such issue.

@Yangqing @orionr
